attributes.action: Give healthy meals to essential workers while working during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Many basic foods are unavailable in shops due to panic buying and many cafes etc are closing due to the pandemic.   Essential workers are being asked to work more to cover for workers who are sick or vulnerable.   As a result, it’s become increasingly difficult for essential workers to get the basics they need to eat healthily and stay well both at home and at work.  We need to take care of them so they can keep doing their vital work.
attributes.background: Use all resources possible such as hospital and school catering facilities, military mobile catering facilities and if necessary commandeer catering facilities in order to ensure free healthy meals are available for every essential workers during their working hours.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
